bibl.title: From Cave to Monastery: Transformations at the Nome Frontier of Gebel el-Haridi in Upper Egypt.
bibl.note: Gebel el-Haridi as a Political Boundary [between the Antaeopolite and Panopolite nomes]. - The Field Project. - The Caverns and Quarries. - The Mud-brick Structures. - The Pottery from GAN [Gebel Abu el-Nasr] 1. - The Mud-brick Structures below Quarry E (GAN 2). - Finds and Pottery from GAN 2. - Late Antiquity at Gebel el-Haridi: A Cultural Frontier.
